title: D.M. Pulley, Karen Zacarias & ‘Intergalactic Nemesis’
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes the grand prize winner of The Amazon Breakthrough Novel Award - D.M. Pulley - who won for her debut novel The Dead Key.  Plus we join The Book Club Play onstage at Actors' Summit with playwright Karen Zacarias.  And hear how a comic book comes to life at Playhouse Square with the acclaimed production Intergalactic Nemesis.
